page.title: 08NW.SHERBORNE:'999' SERVICES
page.content: {Police}- This area is part of the area covered by Sherborne Police Station. This station is open from 0800 hours to 0200 hours and a patrol car is operational within the area during these hours. Outside these hours calls are automatically transfered to Dorchester. All{999 calls}go to Dorchester and if no vehicle is available in the Sherborne area one is sent from Dorchester or Blandford. {Fire}- The twenty firemen at Sherborne are all retained firemen, not full-time. There are two{fire-engines} which deal with about 200 calls a year. If need be fire-engines are called out from Yeovil. {Ambulance}- There is a full-time team based at Sherborne. Casualties are usually taken to Sherborne's Yeatman {Hospital,}but may also be sent direct to the larger hospital in Yeovil.
